p: In the District Court at Montesano September Term A.D. 1888

Comes now LovreyO. Hamilton in answer to the annexed writ of Habeas Corpus and makes return of the same or funds That she holds in her custody the said Ida Tundvall and has held her since the fifteenth day of July A.D. 1887 under and by order of ortects of adoption between said Lovrey A Hamilton and the Orphans House of the Presbyterian Church, located at Portland in the State of Oregon and that the restrains said Ida Lundvall of her liberty in an other manner.
